code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import backend_url from'../config/config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("".concat(backend_url,"/users/login"),{name,password});const{token,role}=res.data;localStorage.setItem('resturanttoken',token);localStorage.setItem('resturantrole',role);if(role==='admin'){navigate('/');}else{navigate('/user-dashboard');}}catch(err){var _err$response,_err$response$data;setError(((_err$response=err.response)===null||_err$response===void 0?void 0:(_err$response$data=_err$response.data)===null||_err$response$data===void 0?void 0:_err$response$data.error)||'Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"bg-white p-6 rounded shadow-md w-96",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-center",children:"Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500 text-center mb-3",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-2 border mb-4 rounded",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-2 border mb-4 rounded",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-blue-600 text-white py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-700",children:"Login"})]})});};export default Login;
